parentSurvey.pageSubtitle: Help us understand perceptions and use of AI in education.

intro.title: About this survey (5–7 minutes)
intro.description: We’re learning how families perceive and use AI in education and how SparkOS can support different learning needs. Responses are confidential and analyzed in aggregate only.
intro.consent: I have read the information above and consent to participate.
intro.adult: I am 18 years or older and responding as a parent/guardian.

relationship.label: What is your relationship to the student?

schoolingLevel.label: Which level of schooling is your child currently in?

aiFamiliarity.label: How familiar are you with Artificial Intelligence (AI)?

childDevices.label: Devices your child mainly uses for study (select all that apply)

aiUsage.label: Have you used any AI-based tools?

options.fewTimes: Yes — I’ve used them a few times
options.triedOnce: I tried once, but don’t use them now
options.notSure: Not sure / I’m not sure those count as AI

confidence.label: Confidence in understanding how AI works

purposes.label: Typical purposes you use AI for

section2B.title: Section 2B: Current AI Usage by Child

childUsage.label: Has your child used any AI-based tools?

options.both: Yes — both at school and at home
options.triedOnce: Tried once, but not using now

frequency.label: How often does your child use AI tools for learning?

purposes.label: Purposes for your child’s AI use (select all that apply)

toolsOften.label: If yes, which AI tools have you or your child used most often?

observedChanges.label: Have you observed any changes in your child’s learning behavior after using AI tools?

benefits.label: What do you think are the benefits of using AI in education for children? (select up to 3)

options.accessibilitySupports: Accessibility supports (read-aloud, simplified text, language help)

concerns.label: What concerns do you have about your child using AI in learning? (select up to 3)

supportTeachersParents.label: In your opinion, how should AI support teachers and parents in the learning process?

guidanceConfidence.label: How confident are you in your ability to guide your child in using AI responsibly?

section3.title: Section 3: Perception and Expectations of AI in Education

perceivedBenefits.label: What do you believe are the main benefits of using AI in education?

perceivedConcerns.label: What are your concerns or fears about AI use in education?

humanInvolvement.label: How important is human involvement when AI is used for learning?

emotionalFocus.label: Do you believe AI can help identify and support your child’s emotional or focus needs while learning?

likelihoodEncourage.label: How likely are you to encourage your child to use AI-assisted learning systems?

guardrails.label: Preferred guardrails for AI in schoolwork (select all that apply)

section4.title: Section 4: Experience Before and After Using AI

preHabits.label: Before your child started using AI, how would you describe their learning habits?

postImprovements.label: After using AI tools, have you noticed improvements in:

engaging.label: Have AI tools made your child’s learning experience more engaging and enjoyable?

inclusivity.label: Do you feel AI tools are inclusive for different learning styles or neurodiverse needs?

heard.label: Before this survey, had you heard of SparkOS or similar inclusive EdTech AI platforms?

distinctiveness.label: From your understanding, how is SparkOS distinct from other AI tools? (Select all that apply)

options.emotionalBehaviorUnderstanding: Focuses on emotional and behavioral understanding, not just academics
options.inclusiveDesign: Designed for neurodiverse and neurotypical learners alike
options.safeGuided: Offers a safe and guided learning environment
options.analytics: Provides teacher and parent analytics for better monitoring

trackingImportance.label: How important is it to track focus, emotion, and engagement during learning sessions?

behaviorAnalysis.label: Would you be comfortable with AI analyzing your child’s study behavior, if privacy is ensured?

trustFeatures.label: What features would make you trust an educational AI system more?

options.dataMinimization: Strict data minimization & local processing when possible
options.optInConsent: Clear opt-in consent for any data sharing

expectedOutcomes.label: Outcomes you expect from SparkOS (select up to 3)

aiRole.label: What role should AI play in your child’s education over the next five years?

considerSparkOS.label: Would you consider SparkOS for your child’s future learning experience?

options.maybe: Maybe, depending on safety and results

additionalThoughts.label: Additional thoughts or expectations for AI in education

supportTrainingNeeds.label: What support or training would help you guide your child in using AI responsibly?

empathyFocusOpinion.label: Should AI in education also focus on empathy, mental well-being and creativity?

idealAiCompanion.label: In one sentence, describe your ideal AI-based learning companion for your child.

common.queueManagement: Queue management and form submission processing
